column4: http://hardware4linux.info/component/17535/ mentions the r8169 driver, try using 'sudo modprobe r8169' in a terminal.
That module shows up in lsmod.
could it be a problem with your "upstream" network connection?
I'm trying this out on a simple gateway with one other PC. I'm confused because I was under the impression that this card will work out of the box with linux.
